title: Update tool: Some javax.* application properties not updated

labels.name: area/upgradetool
labels.description: issues related to upgrade tooling (openrewrite, windup, cli, etc.)

body:
### Describe the bug

Reproducer: https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus-workshops/tree/main/quarkus-workshop-super-heroes/super-heroes/rest-fights

After running `quarkus update --stream=3.0`, the application properties still had the following: 

```
io.quarkus.workshop.superheroes.fight.client.HeroProxy/mp-rest/scope=javax.inject.Singleton
```


### Expected behavior

The application.properties should be updated to 

```
io.quarkus.workshop.superheroes.fight.client.HeroProxy/mp-rest/scope=jakarta.inject.Singleton
```

### Quarkus version or git rev

3.0.3 of the CLI
